article_title: TD Bank Can't Escape Employees' Breastfeeding Suit
article_text:
TD Bank Can't Escape Employees' Breastfeeding Suit

Law360, New York (November 13, 2015, 8:16 PM ET) -- A New York federal judge on Thursday declined to toss the collective actions from a case in which a former TD Bank NA employee is seeking to represent a putative class of women who were allegedly denied adequate workplace spaces for breastfeeding, in violation of the Affordable Care Act.



U.S. District Judge Joseph F. Bianco said little else in his one-page order that denied TD Bank’s dismissal motion. The bank faces allegations that it violated the ACA amendments to the Fair Labor Standards Act by failing...

To view the full article, register now.
